com.cz.library.widget

Class RadioGridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.cz.library.widget.CenterGridLayout
          • com.cz.library.widget.RadioGridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class RadioGridLayout
extends CenterGridLayout
    一个自定义多选组,继承自CenterGridLayout故条目是居中的

    Created by cz on 2015/2/12
